name: wooden plank
examine: A flat plank of worn wood that was probably part of a sunken boat. It's small enough to carry under your arm.

use.result: You lay the plank across the river, resting it on the supports of the former bridge. It's not perfect, but it looks sturdy enough to hold your weight.

name: hatchet
examine: A small hatchet, with a worn wooden handle and a sharpened metal head.
